name: Hypnotic
description:
Hypnotic is a trippy fast paced reaction game where the whole world spins around you! Can you keep your cool and beat all 20 levels in the quickest time possible?

Hypnotic was made for the Extra Credits GameJam #3. The theme was 'Cycles', which inspired me to build a world where everything cycles around you!


Goal of the game:

- Beat a level by reaching the center of the circle.

- Avoid the red lines: they will kill you.

- Beat the game by completing 20 levels. Upload your best time! Best developer time: 01:40.47, try to beat it ;-)

Controls:

Spacebar - Launch the player forward

Esc - Back to menu

R - Restart the game

Disclaimer/warning:

This game contains a lot of flashing lights, and fast movement. If you get sick easily, or can't handle lots of rapid contrast, I would not recommend playing this game.

Tools used:

GameEngine: Unity

3D modeling program: Blender

Image processing program: Photoshop

Audio processing program: Audacity

Credits:

Except for the music, and the fonts, everything was made from scratch.

Font 1: Octagonal (Octab-017)

Font 2: Unsteady Oversteer

Song 1: Connections (YT Sound Library)

Song 2: Trancer (YT Sound Library)
